channel.title: ScoreBoard?
channel.description: Okay, I have something that collects PK points from people, and I have a board to write them out, but how could I make it so it just shows the top 3? Like so the first isn't someone with 10 and the second someone with 12?

item.title: ScoreBoard?
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Well, it’s delta. If that helps you at all…

Read full topic

item.title: ScoreBoard?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Ok, but no one can’t help you here.

Because we do not know what kind of Voids and Int’s you have added into your server.

What names you have given to your codes , etc.

Read full topic

item.title: ScoreBoard?
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Thanks for the help but what I am looking for is a code that takes my current code “rating” (which is rating [a person’s rating goes up with kills]) and I already have it show up names, but I want it to show up names in order. Instead of random people being up there with 10 at #1 and 12 at #2 I want it in correct order.

Read full topic

item.title: ScoreBoard?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Add this to your scoreboard Void.

sendQuest("Rank "+(i+1)+": "+server.rankPpl[i]+ " - Kills: " +server.ranks[i], 6402+i);

EDIT: I’m not quite sure if this is what you needed.

Read full topic
